name: Vanilla Pages
description: Adds Pages to vanilla menus. Original project by Alphalaneous.

menulayer-right-menu.name: MenuLayer Right Menu
menulayer-right-menu.description: Enable pages on the right menu of the MenuLayer

menulayer-bottom-menu.name: MenuLayer Bottom Menu
menulayer-bottom-menu.description: Enable pages on the bottom menu of the MenuLayer

garage-left-menu.name: Garage Left Menu
garage-left-menu.description: Enable pages on the left menu of the Garage (Icon select)

creator-layer-menu.name: CreatorLayer Main Menu
creator-layer-menu.description: Enable pages on the CreatorLayer menu

pause-layer-menu.name: PauseLayer Center Menu
pause-layer-menu.description: Enable pages on the PauseLayer center menu

pause-layer-right-menu.name: PauseLayer Right Menu
pause-layer-right-menu.description: Enable pages on the PauseLayer right menu

pause-layer-left-menu.name: PauseLayer Left Menu
pause-layer-left-menu.description: Enable pages on the PauseLayer left menu

levelinfolayer-left-menu.name: LevelInfoLayer Left Menu
levelinfolayer-left-menu.description: Enable pages on the LevelInfoLayer left menu

editor-build-tabs-menu.name: Editor Build Tabs Menu
editor-build-tabs-menu.description: Enable pages on the Editor Build Tabs menu

editor-pause-guidelines-menu.name: Editor Pause Menu Guidelines Menu
editor-pause-guidelines-menu.description: Enable pages on the Editor pause menu's Guidelines Menu
